mozilla.components.browser.session

Class SessionManager

  • mozilla.components.browser.session.SessionManager

  • public class SessionManager

    This class provides access to a centralized registry of all active sessions.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        public int getSize()

        Returns the number of session including CustomTab sessions.

      • getSelectedSession

        public Session getSelectedSession()

        Gets the currently selected session if there is one.

        Only one session can be selected at a given time.

      • getSelectedSessionOrThrow

        public Session getSelectedSessionOrThrow()

        Gets the currently selected session or throws an IllegalStateException if no session is selected.

        It's application specific whether a session manager can have no selected session (= no sessions) or not. In applications that always have at least one session dealing with the nullable selectedSession property can be cumbersome. In those situations, where you always expect a session to exist, you can use selectedSessionOrThrow to avoid dealing with null values.

        Only one session can be selected at a given time.

      • getSessions

        public java.util.List<mozilla.components.browser.session.Session> getSessions()

        Returns a list of active sessions and filters out sessions used for CustomTabs.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<mozilla.components.browser.session.Session> getAll()

        Returns a list of all active sessions (including CustomTab sessions).
